data.name: Old Engine
data.rules:
Use Livesplit to get without loads time.

Console commands that are allowed: 
cl_showpos
toggle_duck
fps_max
reload
wait
kill 

Any other console exclusive commands are not allowed (ent_remove, sv_cheats 1, ch_createairboat, etc.).

You are also allowed to bind a command to multiple keys (for example having jump bound to space and mousewheel). Binding multiple commands to one key is allowed (For example bind c "reload; fps_max 30").

Save deletion is allowed. No HUD modifications that give you an advantage (for example disabling white flashes).

Using maps from different versions is not allowed, this means you must use maps consistent with the version of the game you are running. (i.e. can't take maps from 2707 and use them in 4044).
